definition: The term refers to the state or quality of being widely recognized, admired, or accepted by a large number of people. It commonly describes the level of fame, public recognition, or general appeal that someone or something has achieved.

examples.german: Die Popularität des Films hat dazu geführt, dass er mehrere Preise gewonnen hat.
examples.english: The popularity of the film has led to it winning several awards.

examples.german: Der Politiker hat seine Popularität durch seine charismatische Persönlichkeit erlangt.
examples.english: The politician gained his popularity through his charismatic personality.

examples.german: Die Popularität der Band ist in den letzten Jahren stark gestiegen.
examples.english: The popularity of the band has increased significantly in recent years.

examples.german: Die Popularität von Social Media Plattformen ist weltweit enorm.
examples.english: The popularity of social media platforms is enormous worldwide.

examples.german: Die Popularität des Produkts hat zu einem Anstieg der Verkäufe geführt.
examples.english: The popularity of the product has led to an increase in sales.
